Closing yearend Dow Jones Industrial averages from 1896 through 2000

Data for Exercise 1.35

Dowjones

Format

A data frame with 105 observations on the following 3 variables.

year
date
close
Dow Jones closing price
change
percent change from previous year

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


str(Dowjones)
#> 'data.frame':	105 obs. of  3 variables:
#>  $ year  : Date, format: "1896-12-31" "1897-12-31" ...
#>  $ close : num  40.5 49.4 60.5 66.1 70.7 ...
#>  $ change: num  0 0.2215 0.2249 0.0919 0.0701 ...
#> 
plot(close ~ year, data = Dowjones, type = "l", main = "Exercise 1.35")
## Not run: ------------------------------------
# ggplot2::ggplot(data = Dowjones, aes(x = year, y = close)) +
# geom_point(size = 0.5) +
